title: Mo Troper Settles Defamation Lawsuit Against Ex-Partner Who Accused Him of Abuse
description: The Portland power-pop artist had taken legal action against his former partner, Dove Stoner, after their abuse allegations preceded him being dropped by Lame-O Records
author: Matthew Strauss

title: Dean & Britta and Sonic Boom Announce Holiday Album, Share Video for New Song: Watch
description: Their cover of Willie Nelson’s “Pretty Paper” leads the collaborative full-length A Peace of Us
author: Nina Corcoran

title: Bruce Springsteen & The E Street Band Add 2025 European Tour Dates
description: Shows in the United Kingdom and mainland Europe will follow this year’s Canadian run
author: Jazz Monroe

title: Helena Hauff Announces Multiply Your Absurdities EP, Shares New Video: Watch
description: “Humanoid Fruit” leads the German producer’s first album in six years and Tresor debut
author: Jazz Monroe

title: Faye Webster Shares Video for New Song “After the First Kiss”: Watch
description: In the clip, directed by Kyle Ng, Webster dresses up as a goblin for a medieval LARPing event
